name: camelizer_get_prices
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool price_tracking_tools.
Tool description: This API currently helps to query for prices of products from Amazon. We will support more other sites/brands soon. Stay tune!
API description: Retrieves the latest prices, and the historical highest and lowest prices of a product from Amazon using its ASIN code.

asin.description: The asin number of a product from Amazon, and must be in the correct format. Ex : B08QB93S6R

locale.description: The locale code to specify the Amazon region. Defaults to 'us'. Options include 'au', 'ca', 'fr', 'de', 'it', 'es', 'uk', 'us'.
